title: Unclosed HTML Tags
description: Layout breaks unexpectedly due to missing closing tags.
solution: Always close tags properly and use browser DevTools to inspect the DOM.

title: Incorrect CSS Selector
description: Styles are not applied because the selector does not match the HTML element.
solution: Double-check class or ID names, and inspect elements using DevTools.

title: Missing Semicolon
description: Unexpected behavior or syntax error due to missing semicolon.
solution: Use a code formatter or linter to catch syntax issues early.

title: Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)
description: Elements shift unexpectedly during page load, impacting visual stability.
solution: Reserve space for dynamic elements and define image dimensions explicitly.

title: Missing ARIA Label
description: Interactive components lack accessible labels for screen readers.
solution: Add descriptive `aria-label` or use semantic tags with associated text.

title: Missing Alt Text for Images
description: Images are not described for visually impaired users.
solution: Use the `alt` attribute for every image. If decorative, set it to `alt=""`.

title: Removed Focus Outline
description: Keyboard users cannot visually see which element is focused.
solution: Avoid removing `outline`, or provide a clear custom focus style.

title: Fetch API CORS Error
description: Request to external API fails due to cross-origin restrictions.
solution: Ensure the server allows CORS or test locally with a development proxy.

title: Misused justify-content in Grid
description: justify-content does not align grid items as expected.
solution: Use justify-items to align items within grid cells. justify-content affects the entire grid container.

title: Overuse of !important
description: Using !important excessively makes styles hard to override and maintain.
solution: Increase selector specificity instead of relying on !important. Reserve it for exceptional cases.

title: Unoptimized Images
description: Large image files slow down page load and increase bandwidth usage.
solution: Compress images using tools like Squoosh or TinyPNG, and serve modern formats like WebP.

title: Render-Blocking Resources
description: CSS or JavaScript files block the rendering of page content.
solution: Use async/defer for scripts and minimize critical CSS.

title: Too Many HTTP Requests
description: Excessive requests slow down page load and increase server load.
solution: Combine files, use caching, and lazy-load non-critical assets.

title: Lack of Lazy Loading
description: Images and iframes load immediately, even if not visible.
solution: Use `loading="lazy"` to defer offscreen content.

title: No Text Compression
description: Uncompressed HTML, CSS, or JS increases transfer size.
solution: Enable Gzip or Brotli compression on the server.

title: Undefined Variables
description: Using variables before they are declared causes runtime errors.
solution: Declare variables with `let`, `const`, or `var` before use.

title: Incorrect Event Binding
description: Events don't trigger due to wrong selectors or timing.
solution: Ensure DOM is loaded before binding, and verify selectors.

title: Improper Use of `this`
description: `this` behaves unexpectedly in different contexts.
solution: Use arrow functions or bind `this` explicitly.

title: Not Handling Promises Properly
description: Missing `.catch()` or `try/catch` leads to unhandled errors.
solution: Always handle promise rejections and use async/await responsibly.

title: Insufficient Color Contrast
description: Text is hard to read due to low contrast with background.
solution: Use tools like WebAIM Contrast Checker to meet WCAG standards.

title: Missing Form Labels
description: Form fields lack labels, making them unusable for screen readers.
solution: Use `<label>` elements or `aria-label` attributes.

title: No Skip Navigation Link
description: Keyboard users must tab through all navigation before reaching content.
solution: Add a 'skip to content' link at the top of the page.

title: Deprecated HTML Tags
description: Using outdated tags like `<font>` or `<center>` affects semantics and styling.
solution: Replace deprecated tags with modern CSS and semantic HTML.

title: Missing DOCTYPE Declaration
description: Browsers may render the page in quirks mode without a DOCTYPE.
solution: Start HTML documents with `<!DOCTYPE html>`.

title: Multiple `<main>` Elements
description: Having more than one `<main>` element breaks semantic structure.
solution: Use only one `<main>` per page to define primary content.

title: Missing Language Attribute
description: Screen readers and search engines may misinterpret content language.
solution: Add `lang` attribute to `<html>` tag, e.g., `<html lang="en">`.

title: Conflicting Styles
description: Multiple rules target the same element, causing unpredictable results.
solution: Organize styles and use clear naming conventions to avoid conflicts.

title: Incorrect Use of Units
description: Mixing units like `px`, `em`, and `%` inconsistently affects layout.
solution: Use relative units consistently for scalable design.
